heisigStory: A label indicating that a garment was made in U.S.A. or Taiwan or Japan is itself a symbol for the systematization of the garment industry.
hint: sth you find written on the garment label
koohiiStory1: Made in china - a system of exploitation . making garments for nothing.
koohiiStory2: A SYSTEMATICALLY made GARMENT will no doubt have MADE IN on the label.
